issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
h2. Problem

Using the instructions in the wiki guide at [Using density-specific resources on Android|https://wiki.appcelerator.org/display/guides/Using+density-specific+resources+on+Android], I added my icons in {{Resources/android/images/res-mdpi/media/icons/}}.

I see that all the icons are getting copied to the {{build/android/res/drawable-mdpi}} directory correctly but when I run the app the icons which were used on buttons & as annotation markers don't show up.

The following results in a transparent button:

{code:lang=javascript}
Ti.UI.createButton({image: '/images/media/icons/buttonicon.png'})
{code}

Similarly, the following results in a transparent annotation which is clickable, but not visible:

{code:lang=javascript}
Ti.Map.createAnnotation({image: '/images/media/icons/marker_pin.png'})
{code}


All other density-specific icons used in the app work correctly.

h2. Discussions

* my question in the Q&A: [Density-based images don't work on buttons & annotations|http://developer.appcelerator.com/question/129524/density-based-images-dont-work-on-buttons--annotations]
* somebody else seems to have faced a similar issue with annotations: [Density specific graphics for Android Map Annotations|http://developer.appcelerator.com/question/123062/density-specific-graphics-for-android-map-annotations]
fields.summary: Android: UI - density-based images don't work on buttons & annotations
fields.environment:
* Titanium 1.7.5 SDK
* Android 2.3?  Is this really the version? Google APIs are required for maps.
* device or emulator?
* Linux version?

comments.body:
Taazza

In order for me to escalate this to the core team, the test case must run without modification, as per the [Creating a Test Case|https://wiki.appcelerator.org/display/guides/How+to+Submit+a+Bug+Report#HowtoSubmitaBugReport-CreatingaTestCase].

Also, despite a community member attempting to assist you [in the Q&A|http://developer.appcelerator.com/question/129524/density-based-images-dont-work-on-buttons--annotations], you have not responded to his questions. Please go back and make certain that you have exhausted this route to resolving this issue.

I will close this for now. Please reopen the ticket once it is complete, and I will move it to the main project.
Please also complete the missing information, denoted by the question marks. Thanks

Closing due to inactivity. If this issue still exists, please raise a new ticket, including all the information in the [JIRA Ticket Checklist|https://wiki.appcelerator.org/display/guides/How+to+Submit+a+Bug+Report#HowtoSubmitaBugReport-JIRATicketChecklist] to ensure that we can escalate it quickly. Read [How to Submit a Bug Report|https://wiki.appcelerator.org/display/guides/How+to+Submit+a+Bug+Report] if you have not read it before, and always start a ticket using the [JIRA Ticket Template|https://wiki.appcelerator.org/display/guides/JIRA+Ticket+Template].

Thanks in advance
